Testing font-feature-settings

Try changing the font-family — different typefaces have different features.

No fancy stuff

Quill waffle fitter fjord Llaeth stitch II. That fluffing tiff.

Everything

fi fj fl fh fa fe fo fu fy fr ft ff ffi ffl ffj st ct ch th it et ti tt ij ll Ll Th AE OE ae oe oo II IV VI IX XI MCMLXVII Qu ſſ ſs ſz ſh ſl ſi ng f.

Quill waffle fitter fjord Llaeth stitch II. That fluffing tiff.

1st 2nd 3rd 4th 1/2 1/3 2/3 3/4 1/5 1234567890 & 100%.

Setting "frac" gives you the nice fractions (3/5, 11/16), but puts ordinary numbers in superscript too: 12.5 1st 7 1999 £32.99.
